title: 18. "I am the Soul that Lives Within"- An Intro to the Highest Self
description:
Last time we talked about the ego. This time we are talking about the true self, the Highest self. In this episode we dive into an intro to who you truly are. We dive deeper into how you are the observer of your thoughts, desires, and emotions and trust me you don't want to miss this!

 

Click here to get my new e-book the 3 Steps to Radical Self Forgiveness

...or click here to get a preview first :) 

 

Book mentioned in the podcast: The Untethered Soul by Michael A. Singer

 

Please don't forget to rate & review!

 

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
